summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 14, Pontius 4th Addition, being the alley between Yale Avenue North and Pontius Avenue, from John Street to Thomas Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 95031 to the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
